body_html:
1. There's currently one, so perhaps no need to add another one.
  2. CWiseUnaryGradTest would be my suggestion here, as it is a unary operator, and convenient to test using a simple list of input test values.
body_text:
There's currently one, so perhaps no need to add another one.
CWiseUnaryGradTest would be my suggestion here, as it is a unary operator, and convenient to test using a simple list of input test values.
body:
1. There's [currently one](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/74a31949b164a9bd501886c4b0b5a574ce7fbfba/tensorflow/cc/gradients/math_grad.cc#L50), so perhaps no need to add another one.
2. [CWiseUnaryGradTest](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/74a31949b164a9bd501886c4b0b5a574ce7fbfba/tensorflow/cc/gradients/math_grad_test.cc#L34) would be my suggestion here, as it is a unary operator, and convenient to test using a simple list of input test values.
